bibliography:

mathematica ex universis ipsius operibus collecta et explicata.
Bologna: Sumptibus Hieronymi Tamburini.

Heath, Thomas L. 1949. Mathematics in Aristotle. Oxford:
Oxford University Press, (reprint. New York: Garland Press, 1980).

Heiberg, I.L. 1904. "Mathematisches zu Aristoteles," in

Vol. 18: 1-49. Leipzig: Teubner.
